Articles.Content:
i THINK that is the KSP Affiliates program. Theres an article about it somewhere lol.

<points one post down hill> YUP! I knew it! YAY ME!

Edited July 8, 2014 by AlamoVampire
Be enlightened, O seeker of the truth!

i THINK that is the KSP Affiliates program. Theres an article about it somewhere lol.

<points one post down hill> YUP! I knew it! YAY ME!

What is make for?
O wow, I didn't notice this announcement. Seems like a good idea!
A club for people who make videos, because Squad like videos.

Not just videos. Anyone who makes any content pertaining to KSP that could conceivably make people buy the game could use an affiliate link. In some of the comments, Rows mentioned that you could even have mods related to KSP who could use affiliate links. Granted, one of the only real way those would make people buy the game is by convincing pirates to cough up enough cash to legally purchase the game, but that's still a valid sale, really.

What is make for?

its for people who do the videos and the like. if they manage to draw players in, they receive a kick back from squad. but the post directly under my FIRST reply says it all

Not just videos.

Aha, thanks for pointing that out. I must have misread one of the earlier communications. So, bloggers, etc. as well, or anyone who has a regular internet audience. Righty ho.
